title: Hailey Bieber shows off her Virgil Abloh-designed wedding gown
text:
Hailey Bieber shows off her Virgil Abloh-designed wedding gown originally appeared on goodmorningamerica.com

Justin and Hailey Bieber are re-living their wedding day on Instagram.

The couple shared several images on social media Monday, in which the bride's dress is revealed in detail for the first time.

Hailey Bieber wore a gown designed by Virgil Abloh, complete with a veil that read, "Till death do us part."

"Last Monday was the most special day of my life," she captioned one image.

(MORE: Check out the first pics from Justin and Hailey Bieber’s second wedding)

"@virgilabloh thank you for making my vision come to life and creating my dream dress. You and your @off____white team are incredible and I’m forever grateful I got to wear your beautiful creation," she added.

Justin Bieber, 25, and Hailey Bieber, formerly Baldwin, 22, legally married last year, and celebrated with loved ones, including Kendall and Kylie Jenner, at the Montage Palmetto Bluff in South Carolina on Sept. 30.

The Biebers first met in 2009, but didn't date until 2016, according to Vogue. They split soon thereafter and reconciled in June, 2018. Justin Bieber proposed the following month.

“I’m the emotionally unstable one,” the singer told Vogue earlier this year. “I struggle with finding peace. I just feel like I care so much and I want things to be so good and I want people to like me. Hailey’s very logical and structured, which I need. I’ve always wanted security—with my dad being gone sometimes when I was a kid, with being on the road. With the lifestyle I live, everything is so uncertain. I need one thing that’s certain. And that is my baby boo.”
description: Justin and Hailey Bieber are re-living their wedding day on Instagram.  You and your @off____white team are incredible and I’m forever grateful I got to wear your beautiful creation," she added.  Justin Bieber, 25, and Hailey Bieber, formerly Baldwin, 22, legally married last year, and celebrated
